text: Alireza Monazzemi (, born 14 December 2002) is an Iranian footballer who plays as a Midfielder who currently plays for Iranian club Zob Ahan in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Zob Ahan=== He made his debut for Zob Ahan in 16th fixtures of 2018–19 Iran Pro League against Nassaji Mazandaran while he substituted in for Amir Arsalan Motahari. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website *Alireza Monazami at Instagram Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Zob Ahan Esfahan F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alireza Monazzemi
